channel.title: control on Fandoming
channel.description: Recent content in control on Fandoming

item.title: FBC: Firebreak - A Supernatural Co-op Shooter from the Makers of Control
item.description: FBC: Firebreak is a co-op multiplayer game set in the Control universe, focusing on teams battling paranormal threats.

item.title: Alan Wake 2 Expansion: The Lake House Arrives October 22
item.description: The Lake House DLC for Alan Wake 2 launches on October 22, alongside physical editions of the game.
